name: Twinkle
overview:
Twinkle was developed by Tirano and published by Semicom in 1997.

Twinkle is a Korean Pac-Man clone. It is a sequel to Hyper Pacman by the same developer and the game play and graphics remain largely the same. The player controls a humanoid ball, eating dots while having to avoid enemies. There are many power-ups. Bombs (for destroying walls), sunglasses to find hidden stuff, and laser helmets.The laser can destroy walls and enemies. Hidden fruits give more points. After eating special balls, enemies can also be consumed (just like in Pac-Man). The Game has 40 stages.
